name: Snow Goose Call - E Caller - BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE
name_original: Snow Goose Call - E Caller - BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE
description:
Want an affordable snow goose E-Caller? The SnowsPro snow goose electronic caller app provides you snow goose hunting soundtracks at your fingertips and it is bluetooth compatible. These soundtracks are clear, crisp, lifelike and effective. Six soundtracks included with unlimited looping time which means no reseting your call. Connect the app to your speaker and amplifier system to pull in tornadoes of snow geese.

FEATURES:
- 6 snow goose hunting soundtracks with unlimited looping play time
- Effective, realistic and clear audio to bring in wary snow geese
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth receiver in the field
- Sounds can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting interrupting the snow goose sounds
- Unlimited looping soundtracks allow you to set the call and focus on hunting
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables (cables not included)
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- E-Calling audio for snow geese at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple soundtracks and memory cards separately

Soundtracks included in "SnowsPro"
- Feeding Frenzy
- Chilled Out
- Mixed Bag
- Huge Flock
- Calm Before the Storm
- Specklebelly Goose & Snow Goose

Download SnowsPro and start having snow goose hunting success today!
